name: The Beat Keeper
description:
'The Beat Keeper' is a VERY simple side-view shooter where you have to ward off hordes of fans form the stage, using the sound-waves from the speakers by ramming yourself against them. This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 Game-Jam! 

This is the FIRST game I've made with Godot and only the third game I've ever made, so it really isn't the best game ever, likely not even that good, but I really enjoyed the time I took making it!
